alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 13 at 1:56PM EDT until October 13 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern Berkshires in western Massachusetts, the Mohawk Valley, Greater Capital Region, northern Catskills, Schoharie Valley, Helderbergs, southern Adirondacks, northern Taconics in eastern New York, and the southern Greens of Bennington and western Windham Counties in southern Vermont. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
